titleStmt.title: Poems annent the keeping of yule, pro and con. Many people retaining the dreggs of Romish superstition, (especially such things as are grateful to the flesh,) make a presence of keeping the 25th. of December, in commemoration of the nativity of our Blessed Saviour, ...

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
